ome.smuggler.core.service.file.impl

Class RemotePathMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ome.smuggler.core.service.file.impl.RemotePathMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemotePathResolver

    public class RemotePathMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemotePathResolver
    Implements RemotePathResolver using a configured remote-to-local map.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemotePathMapper(java.util.List<RemoteMount> remoteToLocalMap)
      Creates a new instance.

      java.nio.file.Path forceLocalPath(java.net.URI path)
      Same as toLocalPath, but forcibly converts the input into a local path instead of returning empty when it can't be resolved using remote-to-local mappings.
      java.util.Optional<java.nio.file.Path> toLocalPath(java.net.URI remotePath)
      Resolves a remote path into a local one.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemotePathMapper

        public RemotePathMapper(java.util.List<RemoteMount> remoteToLocalMap)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        remoteToLocalMap - remote-to-local base path mappings.
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • toLocalPath

        public java.util.Optional<java.nio.file.Path> toLocalPath(java.net.URI remotePath)
        Description copied from interface: RemotePathResolver
        Resolves a remote path into a local one. The input remote file path is mapped to a local file as documented in RemoteMount. If no remote-to-local mappings have been configured or none of them can be used to resolve the remote path, then empty is returned.
        Specified by:
        toLocalPath in interface RemotePathResolver
        Parameters:
        remotePath - a file URI pointing to a file on a remote device connected to this machine through a suitable mount point.
        Returns:
        the mapped path.

      • forceLocalPath

        public java.nio.file.Path forceLocalPath(java.net.URI path)
        Description copied from interface: RemotePathResolver
        Same as toLocalPath, but forcibly converts the input into a local path instead of returning empty when it can't be resolved using remote-to-local mappings. Here "forcibly" means we blindly assume the URI is that of a local file that the Paths can convert to a Path.
        Specified by:
        forceLocalPath in interface RemotePathResolver
        Parameters:
        path - a file URI pointing to a file on a remote device connected to this machine through a suitable mount point or a file URI of a local file.
        Returns:
        the mapped path.
